about_the_game:
Cult of Blood is a survival horror adventure game that plunges players into a chilling, immersive experience with fixed cameras and modern tank controls. Set in a remote village deep within an ominous forest, the game draws inspiration from a true story, weaving a rich and terrifying narrative.

STORY:


Players take on the role of a police officer stationed in an isolated area during a period marked by numerous mysterious disappearances. While performing a routine menial task, the officer is led to a nearby village where a sinister cult reveals itself. This leads to the uncovering of blood rituals and the dark truth behind the disappearances. Players must navigate the eerie village, confronting both human and supernatural threats. The officer's journey transforms from a mundane assignment into a desperate struggle for survival and to expose the village's dark secrets.

COMBAT:


In Cult of Blood battles are intense and strategic, blending survival horror elements with challenging combat. Players face off against both human cultists and terrifying supernatural entities. With limited resources like ammunition and health, every fight requires careful planning and precision. Boss battles are especially intense, featuring formidable enemies with distinct attack patterns and weaknesses that must be exploited. Every confrontation in "Cult of Blood" is a test of skill and nerves..

GAMEPLAY FEATURES:


  • Rich Story: A deeply engaging and intricate plot keeps players on the edge of their seats, revealing dark secrets and unexpected twists.
  • Boss Fights: Players face off against powerful and grotesque bosses, each with unique abilities and attack patterns, requiring strategic combat and quick reflexes.
  • Tank Controls: Traditional tank controls enhance the tension, challenging players to carefully maneuver through the perilous environment.
  • Fixed Cameras: Fixed camera angles provide a cinematic experience, amplifying the horror with strategic perspectives and limited visibility.
  • Survival Elements: Resource management is crucial, as players must scavenge for limited supplies such as ammunition, health items, and other essentials to survive the relentless threats.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4th gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 380 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6th gen / AMD Ryzen 7 2nd gen or above
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 / Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
